full_text:
REQUEST FOR AMENDMENT OF HEALTH INFORMATION
Forward this completed form to the Health Information Management Department
at the Cone Health hospital, physician practice or other area where the record was
created.
Patient Name _____________________________________________

Date of Birth ____________________________

Patient Medical Record Number ______________________________

Telephone ______________________________

Date of Record to Be Amended _______________________________

Type of Record to Be Amended _____________

NOTICE: Patients may seek to change information in their medical records in order to improve the accuracy or
completeness of the information. The original information contained in the record will not be erased or obliterated as
a result of this amendment.
Please explain how the entry is incorrect or incomplete. What should the entry state in order to be more accurate or complete?
Please attach an additional (one) page as necessary.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
Please identify the names and addresses of the persons who must be notified of the amendments, such as your personal
physician. We also will be notifying the following persons who have received health information from your medical records
in order to conduct business with Cone Health.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________________________

__________________________________________

__________________________________________
